mapper.select: /* UserMybatisRepository.getStatusFriend */ select uc3.user_id userId, uc3.status status from channel c1 join user_channel uc1 on (c1.id = uc1.channel_id and uc1.user_id = #{userId} and c1.type = 'FRIEND') join user_channel uc2 on (c1.id = uc2.channel_id and uc2.user_id != #{userId} and c1.type = 'FRIEND') join user u1 on (uc2.user_id = u1.id and u1.email = #{email}) join user_channel uc3 on (c1.id = uc3.channel_id and c1.type = 'FRIEND')
